content: Investments STI ETF SeedlyTV EP01 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Mar 2019If the Singapore index has a average growth of 9% annum does this means STI ETF has the same growth as well?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 27 Mar 2019If the index was tracked perfectly without fees, yes. But that's not how it works. ETFs will have fees and sometimes have tracking errors. But you'll be quite close to the index return.But the STI earning 9% year on year is kinda doubtful. It hasn't even recovered from its peak in 2008.0 comments0
